fields.image_caption: Laurionite crystals in a vug from the Laurium district of Greece

fields.name: Lawsonite

fields.name: Lazulite

fields.name: Lazurite

fields.name: Leadhillite

fields.name: Lepidolite

fields.name: Leucite
fields.color: White to grey
fields.image_caption: Leucite crystals in a rock from Italy

fields.name: Liebigite
fields.image_caption: Liebigite crystals from the Ralston Buttes District, Jefferson County, Colorado

fields.name: Linarite

fields.name: Ludlamite

fields.name: Mellite

White, filamentous mullite in front of thicker osumilite platelets

Found in Wannenköpfe, Ochtendung, Eifel, Germany

(long dimension 0.5 mm, Bushveld igneous complex)
